title: What, where and when
creator_credit: The Gan Council and Denis Shand
brief_description: Sounds hints for housewives: How to buy fish and meat, what makes a balanced meal, using the fridge and storing vegetables, cooking utensils and various hints on all matters dealing with the work of the housewife in the kitchen. No 1 of a Cookery Series suitable for women’s groups and domestic science classes.
